title: 104 - 27 Questions
description: On today's show, the guys go through a list of 27 questions that they received on Instagram and get into things like movie theaters officially being dealt a death blow, which fast food franchise the guys would decide to open if they were going to, overrated and underrated holiday movies, which super power they'd like to have for a single day each week. This episode also marks the return of Soundboard Zeet, Mitt gives a little bit of life advice, the guys debate which breakfast food place has the best breakfast sandwich, and much more. Don't forget to subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and become a member of McAfee's Mafia to watch episodes of The Pod on Youtube, and continue to send in your questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, have a great weekend.
dc:creator: The Pod
